house_listing.house_description: Large corner lot! Beautiful end unit with neutral colors throughout! Hot tub! All appliances including washer & dryer! All window treatments! Gas fireplace! Screened back porch & deck! Don't wait to see this! It will be gone!!! Hurry! Hurry! Hurry!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Garage DoorOpener, Walk-In Closet(s)
